name: macho
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaving forcefully or showing no emotion in a way traditionally thought to be typical of a man: He's too macho to admit he was hurt when his girlfriend left him. I can't stand macho men. Synonym
butch
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaving in a way that is thought to be typical of a man, esp. by seeming strong and powerful but also seeming too determined to avoid showing weakness and sympathy: He’s too macho to admit that a woman can do his job as well as he can.
